section_name.about: Hello, my name is Scott Lease. I come from a wide body of work experience ranging from construction to cooking. In my previous role, I installed, maintained, and repaired X-ray machines and equipment. During this time, digital X-rays took over the industry. I had to learn how to integrate X-ray machines with the digital X-rays and some troubleshooting on the computer systems. It was at this time that I began to research and learn more about programming and that sparked my interest in developing. I took some online classes, but that only broadened my horizon of all the possibilities that are available. I now want to really level up my game to see how best I can break into the industry that I see has so much potential. I‚Äôm so excited to continue my journey and improve the lives and world through technology and my coding skills. I hope you‚Äôll join me on my journey to see how I improve the world.

projects.title: Animal Shelter
projects.description: The most expanded application I had opportunity to work with. I've learned many technologies and my code was reviewed by awesome curator. Application handles all adoption processess and allows to store all evidence on adopting animals from animal shelter.

projects.title: Photography
projects.description: Personal project for study subject. I was responsible for testing photography application that optimizes images with popular algorithms used by graphic editors like Pixlr or Adobe Photoshop. I've earned A grade :)

projects.title: 3D Object Viewer
projects.description: One of the first apps I was working on my internship. I had to develop front-end implementation for app that shows 3D models of known buildings. This was also my first project in Angular framework. I've learned a lot!
